other_gear: masterwork studded leather, masterwork handaxes (2), masterwork heavy crossbow with 20 bolts, 63 gp
feats: Double Slice, Endurance, Quick Draw, Two-Weapon Fighting, Weapon Focus (handaxe)

sections.body:
Before Combat If hunting an animal, the ranger drinks his potion of hide from animals.

During Combat The ranger sneaks close, then charges into melee. If his target is more powerful than expected, he retreats and drinks his potion of bull's strength.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Poachers hunt animals for meat or trophies in areas where hunting is forbidden.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Ranger/Rangers/Poacher/Brayvek the Butcher

sections.body: Brayvek is a sadist who enjoys cutting up animals; selling the meat, horns, and tusks is merely a side benefit.

sections.name: Brayvek the Butcher

name: Poacher
skills: Climb +9, Intimidate +4, Knowledge (geography) +5, Knowledge (local) +2, Knowledge (nature) +6, Perception +7, Stealth +7, Survival +7
combat_gear: potion of bull's strength, potions of cure light wounds (2), potion of hide from animals
